fields.name: AccountBalance
fields.description: Current balance of all corporation accounts.

fields.name: AssetList
fields.description: List of all corporation assets.

fields.name: MemberMedals
fields.description: List of medals awarded to corporation members.

fields.name: CorporationSheet
fields.description: Exposes basic 'Show Info' information as well as Member Limit and basic division and wallet info.

fields.name: ContactList
fields.description: Corporate contact list and relationships.

fields.name: ContainerLog
fields.description: Corporate secure container acess log.

fields.name: FacWarStats
fields.description: Corporations Factional Warfare Statistics.

fields.name: IndustryJobs
fields.description: Corporation jobs, completed and active.

fields.name: KillLog
fields.description: Corporation kill log.

fields.name: MemberSecurity
fields.description: Member roles and titles.

fields.name: MemberSecurityLog
fields.description: Member role and title change log.

fields.name: MemberTrackingLimited
fields.description: Limited Member information.

fields.name: MarketOrders
fields.description: List of all corporate market orders.

fields.name: Medals
fields.description: List of all medals created by the corporation.

fields.name: OutpostList
fields.description: List of all outposts controlled by the corporation.

fields.name: OutpostServiceDetail
fields.description: List of all service settings of corporate outposts.

fields.name: Shareholders
fields.description: Shareholders of the corporation.

fields.name: StarbaseDetail
fields.description: List of all settings of corporate starbases.

fields.name: Standings
fields.description: NPC Standings towards corporation.

fields.name: StarbaseList
fields.description: List of all corporate starbases.

fields.name: WalletJournal
fields.description: Wallet journal for all corporate accounts.

fields.name: WalletTransactions
fields.description: Market transactions of all corporate accounts.

fields.name: Titles
fields.description: Titles of corporation and the roles they grant.

fields.name: Contracts
fields.description: List of recent Contracts the corporation is involved in.

fields.name: Locations
fields.description: Allows the fetching of coordinate and name data for items owned by the corporation.

fields.name: MemberTrackingExtended
fields.description: Extensive Member information. Time of last logoff, last known location and ship.

fields.name: AccountBalance
fields.description: Current balance of characters wallet.

fields.name: AssetList
fields.description: Entire asset list of character.

fields.name: CalendarEventAttendees
fields.description: Event attendee responses. Requires UpcomingCalendarEvents to function.

fields.name: CharacterSheet
fields.description: Character Sheet information. Contains basic 'Show Info' information along with clones, account balance, implants, attributes, skills, certificates and corporation roles.

fields.name: ContactList
fields.description: List of character contacts and relationship levels.

fields.name: ContactNotifications
fields.description: Most recent contact notifications for the character.

fields.name: FacWarStats
fields.description: Characters Factional Warfare Statistics.

fields.name: IndustryJobs
fields.description: Character jobs, completed and active.

fields.name: KillLog
fields.description: Characters kill log.

fields.name: MailBodies
fields.description: EVE Mail bodies. Requires MailMessages as well to function.

fields.name: MailingLists
fields.description: List of all Mailing Lists the character subscribes to.

fields.name: MailMessages
fields.description: List of all messages in the characters EVE Mail Inbox.

fields.name: MarketOrders
fields.description: List of all Market Orders the character has made.

fields.name: Medals
fields.description: Medals awarded to the character.

fields.name: Notifications
fields.description: List of recent notifications sent to the character.

fields.name: NotificationTexts
fields.description: Actual body of notifications sent to the character. Requires Notification access to function.

fields.name: Research
fields.description: List of all Research agents working for the character and the progress of the research.

fields.name: SkillInTraining
fields.description: Skill currently in training on the character. Subset of entire Skill Queue.

fields.name: SkillQueue
fields.description: Entire skill queue of character.

fields.name: Standings
fields.description: NPC Standings towards the character.

fields.name: UpcomingCalendarEvents
fields.description: Upcoming events on characters calendar.

fields.name: WalletJournal
fields.description: Wallet journal of character.

fields.name: WalletTransactions
fields.description: Market transaction journal of character.

fields.name: CharacterInfo
fields.description: Character information, exposes skill points and current ship information on top of 'Show Info' information.

fields.name: CharacterInfo
fields.description: Sensitive Character Information, exposes account balance and last known location on top of the other Character Information call.

fields.name: AccountStatus
fields.description: EVE player account status.

fields.name: Contracts
fields.description: List of all Contracts the character is involved in.

fields.name: Locations
fields.description: Allows the fetching of coordinate and name data for items owned by the character.
